Posts.Content: Jan 6, 2010 11:44PM - edited Jan 7, 2010 12:04AM by Rocco12 just joined today 7/1/10 - 62 1/2 yrs - lumpectomy and 1 node - found out that is cancerous so going back to have more nodes removed and then>>>>>>will update you all - this is a good forum - thank you all ladies for sharing - I forget to say that it was Stage 2 the lump but I do not anymore about it at this stage except about 2.5 cm.
